definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: But she had come this far, she wasn't going to back out now.
sentences.chinese: 不過既然大老遠跑來，絕不會此刻罷手。

sentences.english: Take airplane and greatly and from afar bring to China to this niggard.
sentences.chinese: 坐着飛機大老遠的把這個吝嗇鬼送到中國。

sentences.english: You dragged me all the way out here to watch a war movie?
sentences.chinese: 你大老遠拖我到這裏來看戰爭片？

sentences.english: Isaac meanwhile had moved on as far as Beer-lahai-roi and was living in the Negeb.
sentences.chinese: 以撒此時已搬到老遠的庇耳拉海萊，住在耐格伯。

sentences.english: He picks up the snail and throws it as far as he can.
sentences.chinese: 他拾起蝸牛，嗖的一下扔的老遠。

sentences.english: I dont know why anyone would want to use their money visiting a zoo so far away.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道爲什麼會有人會花錢跑大老遠參觀動物園。

sentences.english: Imagine a desert with two pools of water separated by some distance.
sentences.chinese: 試想一片沙漠裏只有兩個池塘，而且還相隔老遠。

sentences.english: Some kinds of seeds are carried by the wind for great distance.
sentences.chinese: 有些種子被風吹到老遠的地方去了。

sentences.english: It's nice of you to come all the way to see me off.
sentences.chinese: 你真好，還特地老遠跑來爲我送行。

sentences.english: Thanks for coming all the way over here.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝你大老遠的來到這兒。

sentences.english: We plant the trees wide apart.
They came all the way from Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 他們大老遠的從巴西來。

sentences.english: I knew I was on the right move to come so far away from China.
sentences.chinese: 我知道大老遠從中國跑到這裏來，算是來對了。

sentences.english: Sure enough, far from home, he heard the cries of two children.
sentences.chinese: 果然，離家老遠，他就聽到了兩個孩子的哭喊聲。

sentences.english: The visitors descried the tower on top of the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 遊人們在老遠就看到山頂上的塔。

sentences.english: Before I could do anything, he took my books and threw them as far as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我還沒反應，他就拿起我的書扔出老遠。
